mapper.insert: insert into guestboard (gid, pid, content, viewScope) values (#{gid}, #{pid}, #{content}, #{viewScope})
mapper.select: select * from guestboard order by gbid asc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{limit} rows only
mapper.update: update guestboard set content = #{content}, view_scope = #{viewScope}, updated_at = sysdate where gbid = #{gbid}
